txt.en:
'Welcome, [placeholder]!

'As an honoured guest, the High King and High Queen have requested your presence at their wedding banquet on this most momentous Midsummer's Day. Once the ceremonies have concluded, you have been given leave to mingle with the other attendees. It seems quite a few of them desire to speak with you!

'May you enjoy the banquet and remember this night for years to come!'
You have attended the banquet in Merethrond and mingled with one of the many attendees before the night was ended.
And the banquet continued long into the night!
A Long-awaited Banquet, A Celebration Without End

With the One Ring destroyed and the Enemy undone, the Free Peoples of Middle-earth gather to Minas Tirith for a grand banquet commemorating the wedding of King Aragorn II Elessar to Queen Arwen Und√≥miel.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Talk to one of the attendees at the banquet in Merethrond

Attendees of the banquet can be found throughout Merethrond in Minas Tirith (Midsummer).\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: You must complete a quest for one of the guests at the banquet to advance this quest.</rgb>
